A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm so disappointed with this movie. Disney has ruined Star Wars. The most disappointing part of this movie (there are many)\, in my opinion\, is what they did with Luke Skywalkers character. In the original 3 SW movies\, it was Luke seeing the good in Darth Vader and trying to turn him back from the dark side. Luke\, a Jedi master\, now sees the dark side in Kylo and tries to kill him in his sleep?!? wtf then disappears wtf again. That's not the Luke I know. And don't get me started with the Finn/Rose thing.
